name: Survive One Day
description:
You have been brought upon a cursing!

Years have passed and every night when you go to sleep in your comfy bed

you keep waking up on the same monday ,8:30 in the year 1990

Maybe there is something that can save you,

try to do everything right, if you can survive one day correctly maybe you will get out of these loop!

Controls: 

Use the E key to interact with objects.

Arrow keys to move

There are multiple option questions that are answered with A o B key.

Have fun!
